scripts.test-all: npx kill-port 4444 && npx wdio run wdio.conf.js
scripts.sign-up: npx kill-port 4444 && npx wdio run wdio.conf.js --spec luma.sign.up.js
scripts.add-item-to-cart: npx kill-port 4444 && npx wdio run wdio.conf.js --spec luma.add.item.to.cart.js
scripts.purchase-item: npx kill-port 4444 && npx wdio run wdio.conf.js --spec luma.purchase.item.js
scripts.verify-purchase: npx kill-port 4444 && npx wdio run wdio.conf.js --spec luma.verify.purchase.history.js
